p: The RSC in the present studied plant samples has not been reported till date. The RSC in plant samples may vary depending upon genotype, age of the plant, soil quality, geographical location, climatic conditions, cultivation method, and abiotic stress [ 34, 35]. Several studies have presented the application of quantitative estimation of reducing sugar in plants. The determination of RSC in the plant helps to quantify the degree of acrylamide formation in plant-derived food cooked with high heat, which subsequently helps in determining the quality of food and improving the health of an individual [ 35, 36]. Similarly, RSC in grapes is an essential parameter for determining the alcoholic level of the grape wine and checking the glucide level during the fermentation process [ 37].
